scripts.prepare:local: mustache configs/localhost.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache configs/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:matic: mustache configs/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache configs/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:harmony: mustache configs/harmony.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:aurora-testnet: mustache configs/aurora-testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:aurora: mustache configs/aurora.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:matic: graph deploy --product hosted-service wswarren12/opolis-work-polygon --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:harmony: graph deploy --product hosted-service wswarren12/opolis-subgraph-harmony --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph deploy --product hosted-service wswarren12/opolis-work-mumbai-hosted --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service wswarren12/opolis-mainnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:aurora-testnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service wswarren12/opolis-work-aurora-testnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:aurora: graph deploy --product hosted-service wswarren12/opolis-work-aurora --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
